entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 3:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
